page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT (contd.)
page.content:
Many people also commute to work e.g. to Torness (a nuclear power station under construction at Dunbar), also to Edinburgh where the majority work in the commercial field, civil service and clerical work.
The most recent unemployment rate available was{8.4%}(in Sept. 1984). This area compares favourably to the national unemployment average of{12.9%
The relative prosperity of this area has meant that the Government have taken away the development area status and thus in the future it will be very difficult to attract new industry to this area.
